subject: Re: Radio interview about making a "Franks Box" type device
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Bill,

Look forward to the archived show, the word is spreading and it's all 
good news.

-Steve H.


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "psi_research" <vilhellm@...> wrote:
>
> Hello Jon or Bill (not sure of your name since you email doesn't 
match
> the name you signed with) The regular members here try to spread the
> news of this exciting ITC technology and encourage it's members to 
go
> public with the information. I am also on the radio tonight in CO
> discussing the Box and will post the link to the archive afterwards.
> If you have related news you'd like to share we encourage you to do
> so. Thanks, Bill M.
>
